description:
Tamama has been making up lies about all the others in letters home to make himself look good... but now one of his students has dropped by to visit, and is blabbing about those lies right in front of each person!  Will Tamama even survive the afternoon?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tamama Keronsei kara Kita Shounen de Arimasu / Momoka Mezase Nice Body de Arimasu
Tamama et le jeune titarien / La métamorphose de Garance !
タママ ケロン星から来た少年 であります / 桃華 めざせナイスバディ であります
